00221       interactionPtr_(0)

00234    * Destructor. 
00235    */
00236    template <class Interaction>
00237    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::~AnglePotentialImpl() 
00238    {
00239       if (interactionPtr_) {
00240          delete interactionPtr_;
00241          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00242       }
00243    }

00252    /*
00253    * Read angle interaction parameters.
00254    */
00255    template <class Interaction>
00256    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00257    {
00258       readBegin(in,"AnglePotential");
00259       bool nextIndent = false;
00260       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00261       readEnd(in);
00262    }

00304    /*
00305    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00306    */
00307    template <class Interaction>
00308    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00309    {  addForces(true, false);  }
00310 
00311    /*
00312    * Increment atomic forces and compute pair energy for this processor.
00313    */
00314    template <class Interaction>
00315    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(double& energy)
00316    {  energy = addForces(true, true);  }
00317 
00318    /*
00319    * Compute total angle energy on all processors.
00320    */
00321    template <class Interaction>
00322    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00323    void 
00324    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00325    #else
00326    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00327    #endif
00328    { 
00329       double localEnergy = 0; 
00330       localEnergy = addForces(false, true); 
00331       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00332       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &energy_, 1, 
00333                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00334       #else
00335       energy_ = localEnergy;
00336       #endif
00337    }
00338 
00339    /*
00340    * Return total pair energy from all processors.
00341    */
00342    template <class Interaction>
00343    double AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy()
00344    {  return energy_; } 
00345 
00346    /*
00347    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00348    */
00349    template <class Interaction> double 
00350    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(bool needForce, bool needEnergy)
00351    {
00352       // Preconditions
00353       //if (!storagePtr_->isInitialized()) {
00354       //   UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage must be initialized");
00355       //}
00356 
00357       Vector dr1; // R[1] - R[0]
00358       Vector dr2; // R[2] - R[1]
00359       Vector f1, f2;
00360       double rsq1, rsq2, cosTheta;
00361       double energy = 0.0;
00362       double angleEnergy;
00363       double fraction;
00364       double third = 1.0/3.0;
00365       GroupIterator<3> iter;
00366       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00367       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00368       Atom* atom2Ptr;
00369       int   type, isLocal0, isLocal1, isLocal2;
00370 
00371       storagePtr_->begin(iter);
00372       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00373          type = iter->typeId();
00374          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00375          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00376          atom2Ptr = iter->atomPtr(2);
00377          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00378          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00379          isLocal2 = !(atom2Ptr->isGhost());
00380          // Calculate minimimum image separations
00381          rsq1 = boundaryPtr_->distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00382                                          atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00383          rsq2 = boundaryPtr_->distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00384                                          atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00385          if (needEnergy) {
00386             cosTheta = dr1.dot(dr2) / sqrt(rsq1 * rsq2);
00387             angleEnergy = interaction().energy(cosTheta, type);
00388             fraction = (isLocal0 + isLocal1 + isLocal2)*third;
00389             energy += fraction*angleEnergy;
00390          }
00391          if (needForce) {
00392             interaction().force(dr1, dr2, f1, f2, type);
00393             if (isLocal0) {
00394                atom0Ptr->force() += f1;
00395             }
00396             if (isLocal1) {
00397                atom1Ptr->force() -= f1;
00398                atom1Ptr->force() += f2;
00399             }
00400             if (isLocal2) {
00401                atom2Ptr->force() -= f2;
00402             }
00403          }
00404       }
00405       return energy;
00406    }
00407 
00408    #if 0
00409    /* 
00410    * Compute angle contribution to stress.
00411    */
00412    template <class Interaction>
00413    template <typename T>
00414    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStressImpl(T& stress) const
00415    {
00416       Vector dr1, dr2, f1, f2;
00417       const Atom *atom0Ptr, *atom1Ptr, *atom2Ptr;
00418 
00419       setToZero(stress);
00420 
00421       // Iterate over all angles in System.
00422       storagePtr_->begin(iter);
00423       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter){
00424          atom0Ptr = &(iter->atom(0));
00425          atom1Ptr = &(iter->atom(1));
00426          atom2Ptr = &(iter->atom(2));
00427 
00428          boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00429                                atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00430          boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00431                                atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00432 
00433          // f1 -- along dr1; f2 -- along dr2.
00434          interaction().force(dr1, dr2,
00435                            f1, f2, iter->typeId());
00436 
00437          dr1 *= -1.0;
00438          dr2 *= -1.0;
00439          incrementPairStress(f1, dr1, stress);
00440          incrementPairStress(f2, dr2, stress);
00441       }
00442 
00443       stress /= boundary().volume();
00444       normalizeStress(stress);
00445    }
00446 
00447    template <class Interaction>
00448    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(double& stress) const
00449    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00450

00452    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Vector& stress) 
00453         const
00454    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00455 
00456    template <class Interaction>
00457    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Tensor& stress) 
00458         const
00459    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
